name: Rebirth (itch) (JoshuaGeorge)
description:
Controls: 

WASD - Move

F - Interact

Shift - Grab/Push

LMB - Shoot Pistol

You decided to visit an abandoned castle with your friends but none of them showed up! Even worse, you discover the place is swarmed with the infected! Solve puzzles and avoid the infected to progress through the castle and escape!

This is a game that I have made for the Search for a Star 2019 Challenge. Unfortunately I was only able to spend a few days on the project. I dedicated a lot of time to the visuals of the game which I am very proud of, however this prevented me from being able to implement all the mechanics I wanted. I also feel that my code architecture could be vastly improved. Sorry for there only being 2 levels.
